languages.text: "Слава {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императору{/g}!" {n}Арджента опускается на одно колено, и вы впервые видите в ее глазах ничем не замутненную, сияющую радость.{/n} "Мы прошли сквозь пламя! О, разве это не знамение... Ибо сказано ясно — Император благословит достойнейших и упорных в вере!"

traits.locale_text: "Слава {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императору{/g}!" {n}Арджента опускается на одно колено, и вы впервые видите в ее глазах ничем не замутненную, сияющую радость.{/n} "Мы прошли сквозь пламя! О, разве это не знамение... Ибо сказано ясно — Император благословит достойнейших и упорных в вере!"

languages.text: "Praise the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}!" {n}Argenta kneels next to you, and for the first time you see her eyes radiate pure, unclouded joy.{/n} "We passed through the flames! Oh, how can this be anything but a portent? For so it is said that the Emperor will bless the worthiest and most steadfast in their faith!"
languages.original_text: "Слава {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императору{/g}!" {n}Арджента опускается на одно колено, и вы впервые видите в ее глазах ничем не замутненную, сияющую радость.{/n} "Мы прошли сквозь пламя! О, разве это не знамение... Ибо сказано ясно — Император благословит достойнейших и упорных в вере!"

Oh, how can this be anything but a portent? For so it is said that the Emperor will bless the worthiest and most steadfast in their faith!"

Oh, how can this be anything but a portent? For so it is said that the Emperor will bless the worthiest and most steadfast in their faith!"

Oh, how can this be anything but a portent? For so it is said that the Emperor will bless the worthiest and most steadfast in their faith!"

"Praise the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}!" {n}Argenta kneels next to you, and for the first time you see her eyes radiate pure, unclouded joy.{/n} "We passed through the flames! Oh, how can this be anything but a portent? For so it is said that the Emperor will bless the worthiest and most steadfast in their faith!"

languages.text: “赞美{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}！”{n}阿洁塔跪在你身边，她的双眼中散发着纯粹、毫无阴翳的喜悦，这还是你第一次看到她这个样子。{/n}“我们穿过了烈焰！噢，这一定是个预兆！据说帝皇会保佑那些最坚定、最有价值的虔诚之人！”
languages.original_text: "Praise the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}!" {n}Argenta kneels next to you, and for the first time you see her eyes radiate pure, unclouded joy.{/n} "We passed through the flames! Oh, how can this be anything but a portent? For so it is said that the Emperor will bless the worthiest and most steadfast in their faith!"

traits.locale_text: “赞美{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}！”{n}阿洁塔跪在你身边，她的双眼中散发着纯粹、毫无阴翳的喜悦，这还是你第一次看到她这个样子。{/n}“我们穿过了烈焰！噢，这一定是个预兆！据说帝皇会保佑那些最坚定、最有价值的虔诚之人！”

languages.text: «¡Gracias al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}!». {n}Argenta se arrodilla junto a ti y, por primera vez, ves que sus ojos irradian un júbilo puro y deslumbrante.{/n} «¡Hemos atravesado las llamas! ¿Qué puede ser esto, si no un augurio? ¡El Emperador bendice a los más dignos y firmes en su fe!».
languages.original_text: "Praise the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}!" {n}Argenta kneels next to you, and for the first time you see her eyes radiate pure, unclouded joy.{/n} "We passed through the flames! Oh, how can this be anything but a portent? For so it is said that the Emperor will bless the worthiest and most steadfast in their faith!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Gracias al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}!». {n}Argenta se arrodilla junto a ti y, por primera vez, ves que sus ojos irradian un júbilo puro y deslumbrante.{/n} «¡Hemos atravesado las llamas! ¿Qué puede ser esto, si no un augurio? ¡El Emperador bendice a los más dignos y firmes en su fe!».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}を讃えよ！」{n}アルジェンタはあなたの隣にひざまずき、彼女の目が純粋で曇りのない喜びに輝いているのを初めて目にする。{/n}「我々は炎の中をくぐり抜けました！ああ、これが前兆以外の何であろう？なぜならば、皇帝は最も相応しく、信仰に最も忠実な者を祝福すると言われているからです！」
languages.original_text: "Praise the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}!" {n}Argenta kneels next to you, and for the first time you see her eyes radiate pure, unclouded joy.{/n} "We passed through the flames! Oh, how can this be anything but a portent? For so it is said that the Emperor will bless the worthiest and most steadfast in their faith!"

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}を讃えよ！」{n}アルジェンタはあなたの隣にひざまずき、彼女の目が純粋で曇りのない喜びに輝いているのを初めて目にする。{/n}「私たちは炎の中をくぐり抜けた！ああ、これが前兆以外の何かであり得ますか？皇帝は最も価値があり、信仰に最も忠実な者を祝福するといわれていますから！」
「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}を讃えよ！」{n}アルジェンタはあなたの隣にひざまずき、彼女の目が純粋で曇りのない喜びに輝いているのを初めて目にする。{/n}「我々は炎の中をくぐり抜けました！ああ、これが前兆以外の何であろう？なぜならば、皇帝は最も相応しく、信仰に最も忠実な者を祝福すると言われているからです！」

languages.original_text: "Praise the Emperor!" {n}Argenta kneels next to you, and for the first time you see her eyes radiate pure, unclouded joy.{/n} "We passed through the flames! Oh, how can this be anything but a portent? For so it is said that the Emperor will bless the worthiest and most steadfast in their faith!"

languages.text: « Loué soit l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} ! » {n}Argenta s'agenouille près de vous et, pour la première fois, ses yeux s'illuminent d'une joie pure et radieuse.{/n} « Nous avons franchi les flammes ! Oh, c'est forcément un présage ! Après tout, ne dit-on pas que l'Empereur bénit toujours les plus dignes et les plus fervents ? »
languages.original_text: "Praise the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}!" {n}Argenta kneels next to you, and for the first time you see her eyes radiate pure, unclouded joy.{/n} "We passed through the flames! Oh, how can this be anything but a portent? For so it is said that the Emperor will bless the worthiest and most steadfast in their faith!"

traits.locale_text: « Loué soit l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} ! » {n}Argenta s'agenouille près de vous et, pour la première fois, ses yeux s'illuminent d'une joie pure et radieuse.{/n} « Nous avons franchi les flammes ! Oh, c'est forcément un présage ! Après tout, ne dit-on pas que l'Empereur bénit toujours les plus dignes et les plus fervents ? »

languages.text: "Gepriesen sei der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g}!" {n}Argenta kniet neben dir, und zum ersten Mal bemerkst du in ihren Augen echte, klare Freude.{/n} "Wir haben die Flammen passiert! Oh, das muss einfach ein Omen sein. Denn heißt es nicht, dass der Imperator die Würdigsten und Stärksten im Glauben segnet?"
languages.original_text: "Praise the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}!" {n}Argenta kneels next to you, and for the first time you see her eyes radiate pure, unclouded joy.{/n} "We passed through the flames! Oh, how can this be anything but a portent? For so it is said that the Emperor will bless the worthiest and most steadfast in their faith!"

traits.locale_text: "Gepriesen sei der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g}!" {n}Argenta kniet neben dir, und zum ersten Mal bemerkst du in ihren Augen echte, klare Freude.{/n} "Wir haben die Flammen passiert! Oh, das muss einfach ein Omen sein. Denn heißt es nicht, dass der Imperator die Würdigsten und Stärksten im Glauben segnet?"

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'a{/g} şükürler olsun!" {n}Argenta, yanına vararak dizlerinin üzerine çöküyor. İlk defa gözlerinin saf, berrak bir neşeyle parıldadığına şahit oluyorsun.{/n} "Alevlerin içinden geçtik! Bu mucize değil de nedir? Zira İmparator'un inananları arasından en muhterem ve sebatkâr olanı kutsayacağı rivayet edilir!"
languages.original_text: "Praise the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}!" {n}Argenta kneels next to you, and for the first time you see her eyes radiate pure, unclouded joy.{/n} "We passed through the flames! Oh, how can this be anything but a portent? For so it is said that the Emperor will bless the worthiest and most steadfast in their faith!"

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'a şükürler olsun!" {n}Argenta, yanına vararak dizlerinin üzerine çöküyor. İlk defa gözlerinin saf, berrak bir neşeyle parıldadığına şahit oluyorsun.{/n} "Alevlerin içinden geçtik! Bu mucize değil de nedir? Zira İmparator'un inananları arasından en muhterem ve sebatkâr olanı kutsayacağı rivayet edilir!"
